short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Love Tester 3 is a love detector game with which players can discover their true love. Itâ€™s very scientific!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love Tester 3 game is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Love Tester 3 game online pc/mobile.

The player can simply fill in a name and gender, and then fill in the name and gender of the person they are in love with.

How to play:-

                         Players can select the plus button to add multiple candidates and find out which person the Love Tester believes to be the best match.
